document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2018-09
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE CHAPTERS 2.29 AND 2.32 TO REVISE COMPENSATION FOR MEMBERS OF THE PARKS AND COMMUNITY SERVICES COMMISSION AND PLANNING COMMISSION FROM A "PER MONTH" TO "PER MEETING" BASIS
